content.question: Which of the following individuals has high self-efficacy according to the social-cognitive theory of personality?

choices.label: Carol observes her brother get in trouble for lying to their parents and decides never to lie so she will not get in troubleÂ too.
Robert has all of his safety, security, and love needs met, so now he can focus on his achievement goals.
Sammy is sociable, lively, active, assertive, and sensation seeking in social situations.
Marina knows that if she puts extra effort into completing all of her homework assignments in math this year, her efforts will pay off with better grades.

content.answer: Marina knows that if she puts extra effort into completing all of her homework assignments in math this year, her efforts will pay off with better grades.

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
